QuestData.Title: Skulking in the Darkness
QuestData.Description:
I had only heard tales of the Ember Ward before now.
It's breathtaking... yet terrible.
The Light burns the venthyr here, scorching their flesh and driving them mad.
The only reprieve is darkness, but thugs have taken over every inch of shelter outside of this sanctuary.
There is no redemption for them. Only justice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa outcast venthyr in the Ashen Traverse.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kleia in the Charred Ramparts.
